sentence.Network_en: Charles looked round him at the dingy smoke - discoloured walls, the wormeaten staircase.
sentence.Network_cn: 查尔斯看到墙壁到处是烟熏的痕迹, 给虫蛀厂的楼梯.

sentence.Network_en: To our astonishment, over half of them are in and out the wormeaten peanuts.
sentence.Network_cn: 令我们吃惊的是, 一半以上的花生竟是虫蛀的.
